Thank you ]]>Hello,
 
A ${sysapproval.cat_item} approval has been assigned to you in NCI at your Service. Please complete the approval within two business days. You may access the approval in NCI at your Service by clicking the approval request link below or you may click one of the links at the end of the message to update the approval via email. Any messages in the body of the new email will become comments on the approval.

Vendor: ${sysapproval.variables.First_Vendor}
Total Cost: ${sysapproval.variables.total_cost}

${mailto:mailto.more}

Thank you
